68f260054937dacca46c6007 Description: Improvised first-person-view attack drone equipped with a makeshift explosive payload. Commonly assembled from scavenged military and civilian components.

68f51bfb3e92385d1908db68 Description: A first-person view headset designed for remote piloting of drones. Provides a direct video feed from the onboard camera, giving the operator situational awareness and precise control. Common among hobbyists and field operators alike.

68f5333abc75f09d96d97500 Description: A remote control unit for operating drones. Essential for tactical reconnaissance or deploying small drones in high-risk operations.
